name: Classic Paddles
description:
A small Paddle game. Reflect the ball to the other player's side to score points!

First to 10 points wins!

1 Player mode plays against a bot with 3 possible difficulties (Normal, Hard, Unfair)
2 Players mode (No Background, Simple background, Strange Backgrounds)

Controls:
Player One (Left player) - Arrow Keys up and down
Player Two (Right player) - Pg UP and Pg Down.

This game was made with Rpg Maker MZ © Gotcha Gotcha Games Inc./YOJI OJIMA 2020. 

No plugins were used on this project.

Nobody could defeat the bot on "Unfair" difficulty so far.  It's possible to win!  Good Luck!
